chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)
FPset: list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Set
Co: {x : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) & FPset x} -> {x : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) & FPset x} -> Prop

Goal:
forall P R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM), R = strip (fun R0 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => OBuch (fst (P, genOCPf P)) (snd (P, genOCPf P)) R0) (pbuchf (P, genOCPf P)) -> forall a b : poly A0 eqA ltM, In a R -> In b R -> reds a b R

Premises:
Inductive OBuch : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Prop := OBuch0 : forall aL : list (poly A0 eqA ltM), OBuch aL nil aL | OBuch1 : forall (a : poly A0 eqA ltM) (aP Q R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), OBuch (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os

pbuchf : forall PQ : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) * list (poly A0 eqA ltM), {R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) | OBuch (fst PQ) (snd PQ) R}

```coq
intros P R.
intro H.
intros a b Ha Hb.
apply pbuchf_Stable in H.
destruct H as [H1 H2].
apply H2.
split; assumption.
Qed.
